name: Paratrooper
description: No, you can't deploy your parachute again once you've cut it. How would that even work?
requirement: Speak to Elizia to learn about airdropping, and then click base icons on the map while in Drizzlewood Coast to airdrop over areas held by the United Legions.

bits.text: Speak to Elizia Skysight in Umbral Grotto.
